alert.note: Alert for Ozaukee; Washington (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 15 at 10:03PM CDT by NWS Milwaukee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Ozaukee and southern Washington Counties through 1045 PM CDT... At 1003 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Jackson, moving east at 65 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Menomonee Falls, West Bend, Mequon, Hartford, Brown Deer, Grafton, Cedarburg, Port Washington, Jackson, Slinger, Saukville, Bayside, Thiensville, Germantown, Belgium, Fredonia, River Hills, Newburg, Richfield and Colgate. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 100 AM CDT for southeastern Wisconsin.
